file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Address management service
  description: Service to manage addresses of a passenger
  version: '1.0'
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8502'
tags:
  - name: address
    description: Address
paths:
  /search:
    get:
      tags:
        - address
      description: Search addresses
      operationId: searchAddress
      parameters:
        - name: areaCode
          in: query
          required: true
          description: Area code
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: query
          required: true
          in: query
          description: Search query
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Sucessful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Address'
  '/address/{addressId}':
    get:
      tags:
        - address
      description: Get an address
      operationId: getAddress
      parameters:
        - name: addressId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Address id
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: areaLevel
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Level of areas
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Address'
        '404':
          description: Address not found
  /addresses:
    post:
      tags:
        - address
      description: Get a list of addresses
      operationId: getAddresses
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AddressBatchRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Address'
        '404':
          description: Address not found
  '/area/{areaCode}':
    get:
      tags:
        - address
      description: Get an area
      operationId: getArea
      parameters:
        - name: areaCode
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Area code
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int64
        - name: ancestorLevel
          in: query
          required: false
          description: Ancestor level
          schema:
            type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
        '404':
          description: Area not found
components:
  schemas:
    Address:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        areaId:
          type: integer
        addressLine:
          type: string
        lat:
          type: number
        lng:
          type: number
        areas:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
    Area:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        level:
          type: integer
        parentCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        areaCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        zipCode:
          type: string
        cityCode:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        shortName:
          type: string
        mergerName:
          type: string
        pinyin:
          type: string
        lat:
          type: number
        lng:
          type: number
        ancestors:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Area'
    AddressBatchRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        addressIds:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      required:
        - addressIds
